column1: #Text=No, Henry, it's not a new head tax.
#Text=The New head tax is the Quebec Immigrant Investor Program.
#Text=I didn't read about your opposition to the QIIP.
#Text=The head tax was $8,000 each, in today's equivalent dollars.
#Text=The QIIP is $800,000 as a loan, effectively $200,000 or more in opportunity cost to the immigrant over 5 years.
#Text=That's 25 times the value of the earlier head tax!
